# ::tok In regions where the earthquake risk is high , warning the public and spreading disaster prevention awareness could greatly reduce casualties during earthquakes ; this is the very minimum duty that any responsible government should undertake .
# ::alignments 1-1.1.1.3 2-1.1.1.3.1.r 2-1.1.1.3.r 4-1.1.1.3.1.1.1 5-1.1.1.3.1.1 7-1.1.1.3.1 9-1.1.1.1.1 11-1.1.1.1.1.1 12-1.1.1.1 13-1.1.1.1.2 14-1.1.1.1.2.1.1.1 15-1.1.1.1.2.1.1 16-1.1.1.1.2.1 17-1.1 18-1.1.1.4 19-1.1.1 20-1.1.1.2 21-1.1.1.5.r 22-1.1.1.5 24-1.2.1 25-1.2.1.r 27-1.2.2.1 28-1.2.2 29-1.2 31-1.2.3.1.3 32-1.2.3.1.2 33-1.2.3.1 33-1.2.3.1.1 33-1.2.3.1.1.r 34-1.2.3.2 35-1.2.3

      :snt1 (p / possible-01~e.17 
            :ARG1 (r2 / reduce-01~e.19 
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and~e.12 
                        :op1 (w / warn-01~e.9 
                              :ARG2 (p2 / public~e.11)) 
                        :op2 (s / spread-03~e.13

                                          :ARG1 (d2 / disaster~e.14))))) 
                  :ARG1 (c / casualty~e.20) 
                  :location~e.2 (r / region~e.1 
                        :location-of~e.2 (h / high-02~e.7 
                              :ARG1 (r3 / risk-01~e.5 
                                    :ARG2 (e / earthquake~e.4)))) 
                  :extent (g / great~e.18) 
                  :time~e.21 e~e.22)) 
      :snt2 (d / duty~e.29 
            :domain~e.25 (t / this~e.24) 
            :mod (m / minimum~e.28 
                  :degree (v / very~e.27))

                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization~e.33
